actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to require that medical and dental care be provided to retired members of the uniformed services on the same basis as such care is provided to active duty members.

summary.text: Entitles retired members of the uniformed services and their dependents to medical and dental benefits on the same basis as those services provided to active duty personnel and their dependents.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to require that medical and dental care be provided to retired members of the uniformed services on the same basis as such care is provided to active duty members.
